Class Troop

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troop
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dragon, Serpentine
    public abstract class Troop
extends greenfoot.Actor

    Troop Class

    Superclass of all different troops, contains all the necessary instance variables pertaining to the properties of each troop, also includes vital methods for the activities of the troops, such as targeting the nearest troops, establishments, and getting hit by enemies.
    Author:
    Andrew Qiao, Ryo Minakami
